nodes.body: {📢 announcements} _Colorgrave_ announced [April Grove](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IyLO-7ZJ8oU), a game where your new job is a forester in a mystic and peaceful wood. [Wishlist it on Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3622260/?snr=1_5_9__205)!

{📢 announcements} The [Nintendo Switch 2 was announced](https://youtu.be/VrTVeYm4iIM?si=1PJvjqc82f1Cj0qA), and will be releasing **<time datetime="2025-06-05">June 5th</time>**. We look forward to seeing what innovations our developers can create with the new hardware!
{🕹️ updates} _Kris Truitt_ has been working on [spawning pyramid obstacles](https://bsky.app/profile/kristruitt.bsky.social/post/3llyk4huuvc27) for his spooky cartoon game
{🎮 releases} _AzeTron_ released [PokeDraft](https://machine-box.itch.io/pokedraft), a **Pokemon CPU** that is designed to challenge the player
{🎮 releases} _Michael Hicks’s Dissent on Mars_ was released! [Please support the game](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2138560/Dissent_on_Mars/) and give it a review too!
{🎮 releases} _DoodleDupe_ released [Battle House](https://doodledupe.itch.io/battle-house) for their **Game Design Senior Show**!
{🎮 releases} After years of development, _Butterscotch Shenanigans' [Crashlands 2]_(https://store.steampowered.com/app/1401730/Crashlands_2/) has landed on _Steam_ and _mobile_!

{📅 events} _STLGameDev_’s monthly [Gamedev Social](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307069688/) is on **May 8th at 7pm** at _Dirty20 Bar_. Hang out with fellow creators. Chat about making, playing, and admiring games, share game ideas, and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators. _Also_, paint a miniature _Plorp_!
{📚 resources} The full book on [Game Programming Patterns](https://gameprogrammingpatterns.com/contents.html) is available online for free!

{📅 events} _Gateway Game Jam_ and _Creative Lab_ are hosting the [Pixel and Page Game Jam](https://www.slcl.org/events/pixel-and-page-game-jam) for ages 12-18 at the _St. Louis County Library_ on **May 3rd at 11am**. Participants will team up with volunteer first responders, tech industry professionals, and game developers to create their own video game using the program, [Bloxels](https://play.bloxels.com/).

{📅 events} The _St Louis Game Developer Community_ will be hosting an extended week-long [Spring Jam](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307433670/), starting on **May 23rd**! The theme will be revealed on [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/STLGameDev/about) at **7pm CDT on May 23rd**, with a showcase on **June 1st at 7:00 pm CDT** to close out the jam.
{📖 articles} Read up on the latest events involved with our community in our latest [blog post](https://stlgame.dev/blog/spring-2025-update/)!

{📽 videos} _[The Professor](https://www.youtube.com/@TolarianCommunityCollege)_ explains the nightmare when licensing an IP for your game goes wrong in his [latest video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8MPpOfKogM).

{🎼 releases} _Lazarus D. Richardson_ has released the last decade of his music on [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/4oGsoDMcPqT0ZUNA52m8H0?si=4sdWyTBpSV2Iiyo1GBdfug) and [Bandcamp](https://lazarusrichardson.bandcamp.com/)! It spans a many genres, from goofy witch themes to microtonal orchestras!
{📢 announcements} Kris Truitt's *Mansion of a Million Monsters* now has a [steam page](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3627210/Mansion_of_a_Million_Monsters/)! Add it to your wishlist!
